Select LT.Num_Empr, LT.Cod_Quadra, LT.Cod_Lot, CT.Num_Contr From GKSLT_Contratos CT With(NoLock)
	INNER JOIN GKSLT_Lotes LT  With(Nolock)
	ON CT.Num_ChavLot = LT.Num_ChavLot
	WHERE CT.Num_Contr in (429056,430476,412623,421050,420074,422607,
	417738,429139,415362,435028,417879,433007,412498,429630,424469,417184,
	433500,424538,434251,422154,434843,412753,416682,416806,416815,419631,
	420848,424519,427097,428759,429040,429341,430640,431138);
